    AbstractItem - Class in com.university.elements.items
    An abstract class that implements the IItem interface and provides a base implementation for common functionality across all items in the game.

    Activates the CutieCat trap, immobilizing the player until they feed the cat or take the penalty

    Activates the trap in the context of the game.
    activate(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.traps.MadScientists
    Activates the Mad Scientists trap If the trap is still active, the player becomes trapped and cannot move
    activate(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.traps.Trap
    Activates the trap, immobilizing the player if the trap is still active

    AlarmEffect - Class in com.university.elements.items.effect
    The AlarmEffect class represents an effect that wakes up the player from sleep when triggered, simulating the sound of an alarm in the game.
    AlarmEffect() - Constructor for class com.university.elements.items.effect.AlarmEffect
     
    alreadyAwake() - Static method in class com.university.utils.ui.GameNarrator
     
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.AlarmEffect
    Applies the alarm effect to the game, waking up the player by setting their sleep state to false and outputting a message
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.EatCakeEffect
    Applies the effect of eating a cake, which increases the player's power points by 3 and displays a message indicating the effect
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.EatSandwichEffect
    Applies the effect of eating a sandwich, which increases the player's power points by 10 and displays a message indicating the effect.
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.FreezeSpellEffect
    Applies the freeze spell effect If the player is in a room containing a trap of type MadScientists or Trap, the trap's escape method is called using the FreezeSpellStrategy
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.HammerEffect
    Applies the hammer effect.
    apply(GameContext) - Method in interface com.university.elements.items.effect.IEffect
    Applies the effect to the game context.
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.SausageEffect
    Applies the sausage effect, allowing the player to escape a trap in the current room using the sausage strategy.
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.SleepEffect
    Applies the sleep effect to the player asleep status to true
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.SpannerEffect
    Applies the spanner effect, allowing the player to open a chest in the current room If the chest is already opened, a message is shown.
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.TeleportationEffect
    Applies the teleportation effect, which teleports the player to a random room in the current dungeon The player is informed that they have used the teleportation spell and have been teleported
    apply(GameContext) - Method in class com.university.elements.items.effect.XRayEffect
    Applies the X-Ray vision effect, allowing the player to look into a random adjacent room and see its contents The player is notified about the direction they are looking into, and if there is a trap in that room, the player is informed about the trap

    escape(GameContext, IEscapeStrategy) - Method in class com.university.elements.traps.CutieCat

    T

    TeleportationEffect - Class in com.university.elements.items.effect
    The TeleportationEffect class represents an effect that teleports the player to a random room within the current dungeon, excluding walls and the current room.

    USE - Enum constant in enum class com.university.utils.commands.Command
    Command to use an item from the player's inventory (e.g., use potion).
    UseCommand - Class in com.university.utils.commands
    The UseCommand class implements the ICommand interface and handles the use of an item from the player's inventory The command will search for an item by name, and if found, it will apply its effect If the item is consumable, it will be removed from the inventory after use
    UseCommand(String) - Constructor for class com.university.utils.commands.UseCommand
    Constructs a UseCommand with the specified item name to use.

    W

    wakeUp(int) - Static method in class com.university.utils.ui.GameNarrator
     
    WakeUpCommand - Class in com.university.utils.commands
    The WakeUpCommand class implements the action of waking up the player If the player is asleep, it attempts to use an "alarm clock" item from the player's inventory If no alarm clock is available, the player wakes up by lossing power points
    WakeUpCommand() - Constructor for class com.university.utils.commands.WakeUpCommand
